languages.text:
Ваш персонаж подвергся {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативному эффекту{/g}!
Под воздействием негативных {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффектов{/g} возможности персонажей становятся ограниченными — негативные эффекты ухудшают способность сражаться, проходить {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} и использовать оружие или предметы.
Чтобы просмотреть действующие на персонажа эффекты, нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton} для активации {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}панели инициативы{/g} слева, выберите персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и нажмите {console_bind|Func01}. В открывшемся окне выделите нужный эффект и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы просмотреть его описание и узнать, как долго он длится и каким образом от него можно избавиться.

traits.locale_text:
Ваш персонаж подвергся негативному эффекту!
Под водействием негативных эффектов возможности персонажей более ограничены — это может сказываться на их способности сражаться, проходить проверки или использовать оружие или предметы.
Нажмите { console_bind | ???}, чтобы активировать панель трекера хода слева и выберите персонажа, чтобы посмотреть список его статусов.
Если вы хотите изучить описание подробней, удерживайте { console_bind | RightStickButton}

languages.text:
Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's ability to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons and items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left, select a character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01} to see what effects are currently on them. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it. A negative effect's description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.

Чтобы просмотреть действующие на персонажа эффекты, нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton} для активации {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}панели инициативы{/g} слева, выберите персонажа с помощью {console_bind|DPadVertical} и нажмите {console_bind|Func01}. В открывшемся окне выделите нужный эффект и нажмите {console_bind|RightStickButton}, чтобы просмотреть его описание и узнать, как долго он длится и каким образом от него можно избавиться.

traits.locale_text:
Your character is afflicted with a negative effect!
Such effects can hinder a character's ability to fight, pass tests, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative effect's description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's ability to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons and items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left, select a character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01} to see what effects are currently on them. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it. A negative effect's description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.

Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's ability to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons and items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left, select a character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01} to see what effects are currently on them. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it. A negative effect's description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.

Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons or items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left and select a character to see what effects are currently on them. A negative {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}'s description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.
To read the description in more detail, press {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text:
¡Tu personaje sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g}!
Este tipo de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efectos{/g} puede hacer mella en las capacidades ofensivas, la superación de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} y el uso de armas u objetos de un personaje.
Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}iniciativa{/g} a la izquierda, elige un personaje con {console_bind|DPadVertical} y pulsa {console_bind|Func01} para ver sus efectos actuales. En la ventana de información de personaje que se abre, selecciona el efecto y pulsa {console_bind|RightStickButton} para informarte. La descripción de un efecto negativo puede ayudarte a descubrir la duración de su efecto y el modo de deshacerte de él.

languages.text:
キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}を受けている！
このような{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は、キャラクターの戦闘におけるアビリティ、{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}成功、武器やアイテムの使用を妨げることがある。
左側の{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}パネルを有効にするには、{console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押し、{console_bind|DPadVertical}を使ってキャラクターを選択し、{console_bind|Func01}を押すことで現在どのような効果を受けているかを確認できる。開かれるキャラクター情報ウィンドウで効果を選択して{console_bind|RightStickButton}を押すと、詳細を知ることができる。マイナス効果の説明は、その効果がどれくらい持続するか、どうすればそれを取り除くことができるのかを理解するのに役立つ。

Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!

languages.text:
您的角色受到了{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}影响！
这种{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}会干扰角色的战斗能力，在{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}中带来减值，或干扰角色使用武器或物品。
按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}激活左侧{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}面板。按下{console_bind|DPadVertical}选择任意角色，之后按下{console_bind|Func01}即可查看该名角色当前受到的效果影响。当角色信息窗口弹出之后，您可以选择任意效果，按下{console_bind|RightStickButton}了解详细信息。通过负面效果的描述文本，您可以看到该效果的剩余时间，以及可以通过哪些方式消除这些效果。
languages.original_text:
Your character is afflicted with a {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g}!
Such {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} can hinder a character's ability to fight, pass {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}, or use weapons and items.
Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} panel on the left, select a character using {console_bind|DPadVertical}, and press {console_bind|Func01} to see what effects are currently on them. In the character information window that opens, select the effect and press {console_bind|RightStickButton} to learn more about it. A negative effect's description can help you understand how long the effect will last and how you might be able to get rid of it.

languages.text:
Dein Charakter ist mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} belegt!
Derartige {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekte{/g} beeinflussen ihn im Kampf, bei {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} sowie beim Einsatz von Waffen und Gegenständen.
Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g}-Menü auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren, wähle einen Charakter mit {console_bind|DPadVertical}, aus und drücke {console_bind|Func01}, um einen Blick auf die Effekte zu werfen, mit denen er belegt ist. Wähle im Charakterinformation-Fenster, das sich nun öffnen, den Effekt aus und drücke {console_bind|RightStickButton}, um mehr darüber zu erfahren. Die Beschreibung eines negativen Effektes kann dir dabei helfen zu verstehen, wie lange der Effekt anhält und wie du ihn entfernen kannst.

languages.text:
Votre personnage est victime d'un {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} !
De tels {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effets{/g} peuvent nuire à sa capacité à combattre, réussir des {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} ou utiliser des armes et objets.
Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau d'{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g} de gauche, puis sélectionnez un personnage avec {console_bind|DPadVertical} et appuyez sur {console_bind|Func01} pour consulter la liste des effets qui l'affectent actuellement. Dans la fenêtre d'informations sur le personnage qui s'affiche, sélectionnez l'effet et appuyez sur {console_bind|RightStickButton} pour en savoir plus. La description d'un effet négatif peut vous aider à en comprendre la durée et le moyen de vous en débarrasser.

languages.text:
Karakterin bir {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkiye{/g} maruz kaldı!
Bu tarz {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkiler{/g}; karakterin savaşma, {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testleri{/g} geçme veya silah ya da eşya kullanma kabiliyetini sekteye uğratabilir.
{console_bind|LeftStickButton} düğmesine basarak soldaki {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}öncelik{/g} panelini etkinleştir. {console_bind|DPadVertical} ile bir karakter seçip {console_bind|Func01} düğmesine basarak üzerinde mevcutta hangi etkilerin bulunduğunu gör. Açılan karakter bilgi penceresinden etkiyi seç ve {console_bind|RightStickButton} düğmesine basarak o etki hakkında daha fazla bilgi edin. Olumsuz etkinin açıklaması, o etkinin ne kadar süreceğini ve ondan nasıl kurtulabileceğini anlamana yardımcı olabilir.
